sentences.cn: 一群易兴奋的十岁儿童

sentences.en: A general model of the magnetic stimulation of excitable tissue is presented.
sentences.cn: 本文建立了磁刺激可兴奋性组织的一般模型.

sentences.en: A puppy is naturally affectionate and excitable.
Covers ion channels in excitable membrane, synaptic transmission, and synaptic plasticity.
sentences.cn: 可激发细胞膜上之离子通道, 神经突触传导与神经突触可塑性.

sentences.en: Emphasis placed on the cellular properties of neurons and other excitable cells.
sentences.cn: 重点关注神经元和其他易兴奋细胞在细胞水平上的特性.

sentences.en: Excitable and turbulent in trifling matters, when actual bodily danger threatened he was an abnormal quiet.
sentences.cn: 他往往会为了鸡毛蒜皮的小事脾气急躁, 暴跳如雷,可是真正碰到了生命的威胁,却反而镇静异常.

sentences.en: He is so hot-tempered and excitable, like a bottle of soda water exploding.
sentences.cn: 他脾气火暴，容易激动，就像一瓶喷溅的汽水。

sentences.en: Mary sat beside Elaine, who today seemed excitable.
sentences.cn: 玛丽坐在伊莱恩身边，伊莱恩今天似乎有些激动。

sentences.en: Opera singers often display a lot of temperament, ie are moody or excitable.
sentences.cn: 歌剧演员的性情常常不稳定(情绪多变或爱激动).

sentences.en: Pen was a very excitable person.
sentences.cn: 潘是个非常容易激动的人.

sentences.en: Perhaps he may become extremely nervous and excitable.
sentences.cn: 他可能会变得极度神经质与极度兴奋.

sentences.en: The dangerous, excitable tremor was still in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她说起话来还是因为害怕及激动而颤抖。

sentences.en: The enhancement surface plasmon oscillation excitable on the electrodeposited Pt surfaces.
sentences.cn: 铂纳米膜的红外吸收增强,可能与其本身表面等离子振荡的激发有关.

sentences.en: The staff were somewhat alarmed by the man, who was in an excitable state.
sentences.cn: 那个情绪激动的男人让职员们感到有些恐慌。

sentences.en: There is no doubt that he was in a highly excitable condition just now.
sentences.cn: 很可能他刚才处于极度兴奋状态之中.

sentences.en: They were whipping up nationalist frenzy among the excitable crowds.
sentences.cn: 他们在情绪浮动的群众中,激起民族主义的冲动.
